title: Nick Jr. Schedule
description: What's on Today: June 29, 2018. All times are ET.

schedule.description: Meet Monty – the loneliest (and only-est) rhinoceros in the zoo. He needs a friend, and Gil and the Bubble Guppies are determined to help while learning all about habitats at the zoo!
Are you ready to rock?  The Bubble Guppies are taking the stage with their guitars, drums and keyboards.  Get ready to crank it up to 10 and learn about everything rock and roll.
Abuela gives Dora and Boots a present for Dora's new puppy, but they'll have to watch out for Swiper, who's got a bunch of new swiping tricks up his sleeves.

Dora's baby brother and sister just love bananas, but they also love stories! So Dora tells them a Super Babies story! The Super Babies have to get their bananas back from that Super Villain Swiper the Fox.
Dora and Boots are playing catch when they discover a lost Baby Fox. And he wants his mommy! Just then, Swiper shows up to swipe Boots' superball.
Diego is out exploring volcanoes when suddenly, Alicia calls him on his Video Watch and tells him underwater volcanoes are about to blow!!!
Mommy Maned Wolf has just given birth to 5 wolf pups at the Rescue Center. But when Diego, Alicia and Dora count the wolf pups, one of them is missing!
We help Steve and Blue fix their broken toy plane.  There's something else to fix, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out what it is.
Blue leaves tactile, visual, and audio clues for us and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play next.
We are having a big art show and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue is making for the show.
During the East Bunnyhop International Fair, Ruby wants to find a special souvenir, while Max is obsessed with the “piñata!”

schedule.episodeTitle: Max Cleans Up/Max's Cuckoo Clock/Ruby's Jewelry Box
schedule.description: Ruby wants to clean up Max's messy room but Max cannot throw anything away.  Max helps Ruby by tidying the mess away - into his pocket!

schedule.episodeTitle: Ruby's Hoola Hoop/Max and the Martians/Ruby's Real Cinderella
schedule.description: Louise is trying to teach Ruby how to hula hoop, but Max’s toy Bugs keep getting in the way./Max helps the Bunny Scouts see Mars through their telescope./ Ruby doesn’t want Max to play Cinderella with her because he’s too dirty.
Dora and Boots are at the beach when they find Sirena, a little lost mermaid, who needs to get back to her mommy at Mermaid Cove.

Dora and Boots are making a Shape Train in his Boots' sticker book, but when the train goes rolling down the track without Círculo the steering wheel, they need your help to catch it before it gets to Big Turn!
Diego and a pair of singing red-eyed tree frogs are practicing for the Rainforest Recital when Alicia calls from a natural amphitheater.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pampas Cat and Friends Help the Rescue Center
schedule.description: “Pampas Kittens love to play! <Purr, purr, purr>!” Sing the Pampas Kittens as they take a log-ride down stream. But uh oh! When a big storm swoops through the grasslands, it pushes them towards a waterfall!

schedule.episodeTitle: Franklin and the Super Sleepover/Franklin and the Snoring Situation
schedule.description:
The Beaver family arrives for a weekend stay with the Turtles and Franklin is feeling put
out that his familiar routines are being disturbed.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pop Up Camp Out/The Pop-Up Roller Coaster
schedule.description: When Zack takes all of his friends camping so they can see a once in a lifetime comet, he finds out that Quack has some funny ideas about what camping is.

schedule.episodeTitle: Wish Upon A Star/Sleepy Head Monster/Opposites Day
schedule.description: Father Bear and Little Bear are far apart, but make a pact to say goodnight to the moon.  When the moon doesn't appear, Mother Bear and Little Bear wish on a star instead.

schedule.episodeTitle: Daisy and Poppy's Playgroup/No Magic Day
schedule.description: Young fairy princess Holly and her best friend Ben Elf live in Little Kingdom, a tiny land where flowers and grass grow above the tallest towers. Together, Holly and Ben go on adventures with their friends and work together to fix magical mistakes.

schedule.episodeTitle: Save Little Red Riding Hood!/Save the Turtle!
schedule.description: The Wonder Pets journey back into Puppetland to save Little Red Riding Hood from the Big Bad Wolf. /When Tuck dives into his pond, he accidentally ends up stranded on a Coral Reef in the Caribbean.

When the Tickety Townsfolk set sail on the high seas for their annual holiday, no one suspects that there’s a storm brewing!  After becoming marooned on a desert island, they forge a plan to get them back home before chime time!

Join Pablo the precocious penguin, Tyrone the mellow moose, appropriately named Uniqua, a determined hippo named Tasha and the cutest kangaroo on the block, Austin, for backyard musical adventures as big as their imaginations.
When Hazel accidentally replicates herself 11 times to clean her room quickly, she must reverse the spell before the Hazel’s make an even bigger mess.

In this animated musical-comedy-adventure series, expert hairstylist Sunny uses her unique skills, positive attitude, and physical prowess to creatively solve problems and help friends in the colorful community of Friendly Falls.
Nella is a princess who transforms into a knight! She goes on fantastical adventures with her friends, Sir Garret, Trinket, and Clod, to fight for what's right.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Tale of the Uninvited Badger/The Tale of the Brewing Storm
schedule.description: When Tommy Brock decides he’s had enough of the cold, he takes shelter by the fire inside the Bouncer’s Burrow.

Based on the beloved books by Rosemary Wells, each episode of Max & Ruby centers around Max, a preschool bunny, and his seven-year-old sister Ruby. The humorous relationship between siblings is at the heart of these stories.
Cuquín sees his sisters playing at being princess archers and laughs at them. Cleo decides to organize a grand tournament. Who will win?

Cleo & Cuquin follows the adventures of Cleo, Cuquin, and their siblings. They will resolve minor conflicts by playing at being something: gardener, astronaut... at the end of each chapter, Cleo will discover what she wants to be when she grows up.
Playing with Tomato, Cuquín breaks the tank that supplies the house with water. And it’s really hot! Cleo has an idea; they’ll be waiters and make sure that no one goes thirsty!

Colitas is upset because she’s ill and can’t go out to play in the pool. But Cleo and Cuquin soon convince her that she can also have lots of fun indoors. They organize a very special, magical afternoon!

It’s that time of the year. The birds are tweeting, and all the crops are looking ripe and ready to harvest. The squirrels remember when they planted their seeds, watered them, and left them to grow, and now it is time to help Duggee pick them!
Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouse's birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but he’s lost it! He’s having a problem remembering where he was when it fell out. The squirrels start to look for it, but they can’t find the tooth anywhere.Time to think carefully and remember!

schedule.episodeTitle: Other Side of the Mountain/Who's Geoffrey?
schedule.description:
When Bertie is sent on a diversion that passes on the other side of the mountain, Thomas gets jealous that he can’t go there.

When Thomas has an accident, he blames it on an imaginary engine, and his lie gets out of hand.
Team Umizoomi’s friend David is saving his allowance to buy a cool Red Racer Bike. Milli, Geo and Bot take on different jobs around the city to help David earn enough UmiDollars to buy the bike!

ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks, featuring international superstars Alvin, Simon and Theodore, takes us on a roller coaster ride of music, laughter and stories geared to entertain The Chipmunks’ four generations of fans.

schedule.episodeTitle: Shirley's Sleep-Over Adventure/A Little Off Track
schedule.description: Top Wing is an action-adventure preschool series that follows a team of eager young birds training at the Top Wing Academy.

After Molly and Gil meet Bobby, a nature show host from Australia, they can't wait to learn all about Australian animals. From marsupials to the amazing platypus, the Guppies can't get enough of the creatures Down Under!
Nella is a princess who transforms into a knight! She goes on fantastical adventures with her friends, Sir Garret, Trinket, and Clod, to fight for what's right.

In this animated musical-comedy-adventure series, expert hairstylist Sunny uses her unique skills, positive attitude, and physical prowess to creatively solve problems and help friends in the colorful community of Friendly Falls.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Long Grass/Dentist/Nature Trail/Rebecca Rabbit/School Bus Trip
schedule.description: The grass has grown very long./Peppa and George are going to the dentist./The family are driving out to the countryside./Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house./Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and friends on a bus trip.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Eye Test/Granddad Dog’s Garage/Foggy Day/Jumble Sale/Swimming
schedule.description: Peppa’s friend wears glasses./Peppa’s car runs out of petrol./Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. /Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale./Peppa and her family are at the pool.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Queen/Perfume/Mirrors/The Olden Days/Mr. Bull in a China Shop
schedule.description: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's award for Industry for all the hard work she does. Peppa and her friends accompany Miss Rabbit to the Palace to meet the Queen!
Team Umizoomi’s friend David is saving his allowance to buy a cool Red Racer Bike. Milli, Geo and Bot take on different jobs around the city to help David earn enough UmiDollars to buy the bike!

schedule.episodeTitle: Shirley's Sleep-Over Adventure/A Little Off Track
schedule.description: Top Wing is an action-adventure preschool series that follows a team of eager young birds training at the Top Wing Academy.
Squidward's lazy Sunday is constantly interrupted by Spongebob and Patrick's Good Neighbor Club activities./Squidward becomes obsessed with winning a prize from the Skill Crane.
SpongeBob and Patrick work as crew members for The Flying Dutchman./ It's time to give Gary a bath, but he doesn't want to take one.

schedule.episodeTitle: All Star Pups!/Pups Save Sports Day
schedule.description:
It’s monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondo’s team, until an eagle steals the ball.

The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save A Sleepwalking Bear/Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny
schedule.description:
The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up.

Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

schedule.episodeTitle: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Royal Kitties
schedule.description: The Royal Kitties are kidnapped on their way to Adventure Bay for a special visit. Ryder needs all the pups to help Chase investigate this case in an Ultimate Police Rescue!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save the PawPaws/Pups Save a Popped Top
schedule.description:
Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the PAW Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

The top of Farmer’s Al’s silo has been knocked off, and he needs help saving his corn crop.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Chill Out/Pups Save Farmer Alex
schedule.description:
Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch.

Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save a Sniffle/Pups and the Ghost Cabin
schedule.description:
A sick day for the PAW Patrol? While Rubble and Ryder search for Farmer Al's runaway pigs, Marshall cares for his sniffly pup pals!

First Rubble's lunch disappears, then Jake's lunchbox walks away!  Could it be a... ghost?!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save the Butterflies/Pups Save an Underground Chicken
schedule.description:
Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay!

The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay’s underground tunnel system.

schedule.episodeTitle: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell/Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm
schedule.description:
Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol!

Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save the PawPaws/Pups Save a Popped Top
schedule.description:
Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the PAW Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

The top of Farmer’s Al’s silo has been knocked off, and he needs help saving his corn crop.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles/Pups Save the Shivering Sheep
schedule.description:
Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs!

Farmer Al's sheep run away, and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save Jake's Cake/Pups Save a Wild Ride
schedule.description:
Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin.

Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save an Elephant Family/Pups and the Mischievous Kittens
schedule.description:
The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family!

To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!
Squidward gets a pure-bread snail, Snelle, and decides to race her in the snail races./Mr. Krabs feels old so he asks if he could join Spongebob and Patrick on a wild night out.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Inmates of Summer/To Save a Squirrel
schedule.description: Instead of getting on the ship headed for summer camp, SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally board a ship full of prisoners on their way to jail on Inferno Island./SpongeBob and Pat stow away on one of Sandy’s wilderness adventure.

schedule.episodeTitle: Sand Castles in the Sand/Shell Shocked
schedule.description: A friendly day of building sand castles soon turns into all out war when SpongeBob and Patrick use their sand creations to battle each other.

Pearl’s getting ready for her slumber party, but Mr. Krabs’ meddling in the party preparations is getting out of control./SpongeBob decides to enter Gary in a pet show and gives him a makeover after seeing the competition.

Captain Man & Kid Danger are invited are invited by internet celebrity Frankini to a party, but when they arrive they find that Frankini has plans to reveal their identities to the world! Guest Stars: Frankie Grande, Zoran Korach

schedule.episodeTitle: One of the Boys/A Tattler’s Tale
schedule.description:
Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality.
Lola wants to be a part of the siblings’ secrets club, but they won’t let her in because she’s a “tattle tale."

schedule.episodeTitle: Along Came a Sister/Chore and Peace
schedule.description:
Lincoln is given the responsibility of taking home his classes’ tarantula, but it gets loose and wreaks havoc!
Thinking he has the worst chores, Lincoln decides to go on strike until someone will swap chores with him.

Lincoln plots to take the “perfect” family photo for his parents’ anniversary gift.
Lincoln and his sisters bet on who can go the longest without doing their most annoying habits.

Lincoln gets a tutor that all his sisters instantly get crushes on, making it impossible for Lincoln to study.
The kids complain about their house, but when a tornado threatens to destroy it, they start to feel differently.

Lincoln has a plan for introducing himself to a new girl, but when the sisters catch him he has to avoid them.
Pop Pop introduces his new girlfriend to the family. She seems great until she starts showing up unannounced. Guest Star:Jennifer Coolidge
Everyone in the family has been working hard to save up for a family vacation. But while road tripping to their destination, everything that can go wrong for the family does.

schedule.episodeTitle: Sync or Be Silly vs. Team Blonde
schedule.description: It’s buddies vs. besties in a series of wet, slippery, and balloon-popping challenges. While one team is determined to take on a number of physical challenges, it’s the other team’s brains that advance them to the final round.

schedule.episodeTitle: Sisters on a Roll vs. Synergy Skaters
schedule.description: Two teams compete in new, messy challenges of classic games, the water balloon and egg toss! However, in this high scoring game, one team pulls ahead and earns them a shot at the obstacle course.
When the girls find out Craig’s new co-star might have designs on him, they have to get her out of the picture, and force Craig and Beth to admit their feelings for each other.
